Holiday Money Get in touch Book a video call Make an enquiry Call 0800 713 715 Help Get in touch Back Trending View gallery / Back Light-Towers by Night Sails in the Desert Wintjiri Wiru Twilight Crowne Plaza Alice Springs Lasseters Northern Territory 6 Day Red Centre Tracks 5 Nights • Car hire • Tours Overview Inclusions Terms & Conditions Located at the foot of the MacDonnell Ranges and adjoining the picturesque Alice Springs Golf Course, the Crowne Plaza Alice Springs Lasseters hotel offers modern, stylish accommodation with a touch of luxury. Your spacious room boasts a private balcony or courtyard with breath-taking views of Central Australia, creating a serene retreat. You can unwind with the hotel’s premium amenities, including an outdoor heated lap pool, spa, sauna, and gym. The on-site Tali Restaurant offers a delightful dining experience with indoor and alfresco options, perfect for savouring the flavours of the region. Set in Ayers Rock Resort and just 20 minutes from Uluru, Outback Hotel is laid-back accommodation with warm Australian hospitality. The air-conditioned rooms feature private ensuite bathrooms and tea and coffee making facilities. Enjoy access to all the resort facilites including the central swimming pool, the Resort Town Square with its cafés and shops, free Indigenous activities, return Ayers Rock airport transfers, and access to the Resort shuttle service, making it an ideal base for exploring Uluru’s majestic landscapes. Wintjiri Wiru After Dark is an immersive cultural experience at Ayers Rock Resort highlighting Anangu heritage through a captivating display of drones, lights, music, and storytelling. Witness the Mala story under the desert sky, seated in a sustainably built amphitheater, and enjoy a seamless return to your hotel afterward. Halfway between Alice Springs and Uluru lies Kings Canyon, a breath-taking natural wonder. This ancient sandstone marvel offers towering domes, deep gorges, and lush rock pools surrounded by native flora. Stay at Discovery Resorts – Kings Canyon to experience the awe-inspiring Light-Towers by Night installation by Bruce Munro. This enchanting sound and light display provides a magical finale to your Red Centre adventure. View more View less 5 nights + tours from $ 1949 per person share twin. Flights are additional Trending Enquire now Sale Period : until 31 Mar 26 or until sold out Your inclusions 6 Day car hire in a Kia Sportage or similar - pick up/drop off Alice Springs Airport 1 Night at Crowne Plaza Alice Springs Lasseters in a Standard King Room 2 Nights at Outback Hotel, Ayers Rock Resort in a Standard Room Wintjiri Wiru After Dark 1 Night at Discovery Resorts – Kings Canyon in a Standard Room with Breakfast Light-Towers by Night 1 Night at Crowne Plaza Alice Springs Lasseters in a Standard King Room EXCLUDES: NT Park Pass & Uluru Kata Tjuta National Park Pass IMPORTANT NOTICE: Packaged vehicle is not permitted to driven on any unsealed roads and on the Mereenie Loop. If you wish to drive these routes you will need to upgrade your vehicle to a full 4WD Vehicle. Price From From $1949 per person share twin Travel: 01 Apr – 28 May 26 From $2169 per person share twin Travel: 29 May – 30 Sep 26 From $2099 per person share twin Travel: 01 Oct – 31 Oct 26 Terms & Conditions Valid for new bookings to 31 Mar 2026 unless sold out prior • Prices are correct as at 28 Oct 25 • Pricing is a GUIDE ONLY and is correct at time of submissions but is subject to change without notice due to dynamic pricing • Inclusions are subject to change based on supplier operational capabilities. International and Domestic flights and National Passes are not included • Car hire is with Avis Australia, pick up/drop off Alice Springs Airport and subject to dynamic availability. Vehicle excess conditions will apply • Prices may vary due to a number of factors including tax and surcharge increases, exchange rate movements, routing and availability • Payment schedule will be advised at time of booking • Some surcharges, closeouts and accommodation restrictions apply • Min/max stays apply • Twin share is based on 2 adults sharing a room, bedding configurations may vary • Any hotel credits that are unused are not refundable, transferable & can’t be exchanged for cash • Advertised prices are per person based on payment by cash or eftpos. Credit card fees will apply • Amendment and cancellation fees apply • Accommodation ratings are based on House of Travel ratings and are a guide only to the overall quality of the property • Packages are subject to availability • Product is supplied by reputable suppliers with their own terms and conditions • Please ask your House of Travel consultant for full details.
